history.text: Hello!
How are you?
Good yyou
Good You?
Great, do you happen to know about a good movie?
Have you ever watched Homew Alone?
No, I haven't watched it. From what year is it?
It was made in 1990 with a young Macaulay Culkin. It is a classic Christmas movie
I see, could you give a little summary of the movie?
Short summary*

Its about a child who gets accidentally left at home. The rest of the family leaves for vacation and he wakes up to an empty house. Then a pair of theives attempt to rob the house all the while the young child sets up tricks and traps in a very comical film.
Sounds good! I see, so it is a comedy film. Who plays the thieves?
And do you happen to know the movie ratings? For example on Rotten Tomatoes
Joe Pesci (Harry) and Daniel Stern (Marv) and they were perfect for the role
rotten tomatoes gives it 5.5/10
It is rather low that rating, what is your personal opinion of the movie?
My family watches it every year 8/10 is my personal rating
You think you would watch it, it is definitely a must see
Ok ok, anything you include something in your personal life, it rises the value for you, in this case it has emotional value!
What is your favorite scene?
When the pair of theives enter the house and attempt to chase Kevin upstairs. One of my favorite Booby traps. I wont spoil the fun but it is hillarious.
It surely sounds like a good scene! Thanks for sharing it

And do you think the movie has an hidden message to the audience? Perhaps a lection
?
In the end you dont realize how much you love your family until you experience life with out them
Awesome, I always like when you can form an opinion or learn something from a film
It is one of the reasons why I love cinema
That is one reason why I love re-watching some of the older classics.
By the way, do you know who directed the  movie?
I believe it was Chris Columbus
ON a side note I never really look at Rotten Tomatoes ratings
I don't recall in this moment any films from him, what a bad memory do I have!
Don't you consider ratings before watching a movie?
Cinemascore has a better representative of my taste.
They gave it an A rating so you should check it out
Oh, I see. Nice point of view. Well, Thanks for the conversation!
Bye
It was a pleasure, good day!
